SELECT PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID, PSO.SALES_ORDER_NO, PSO.INVOICE_TITLE, PSO.DISCOUNT_PRICE TOTAL_MONEY, PSO.CONSIGNEE, PSO.CUST_NO, PSO.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, PSO.DISCOUNT, (case SA.ACCOUNT_TYPE when 'EM' then HRE.CHINESENAME when 'CU' then CUST_INFO.CUST_NAME else CUST_INFO.CUST_NAME end ) ORDERED_PERSON, CBI.CUST_NAME, PSO.RECEIVER_MOBILE MOBILEPHONE, date_format(PSO.ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER_DATE, PSM.SALES_MODE_NAME, PSO.SALES_MODEL_NO FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER PSO left join PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL PSM on PSO.SALES_MODEL_NO = PSM.SALES_MODE_NO left join HR_EMPLOYEE HRE on PSO.EMPID = HRE.EMPID left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CBI on PSO.CUST_NO = CBI.CUST_NO left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CUST_INFO on PSO.EMPID = CUST_INFO.CUST_ID left join SY_ADMIN SA on PSO.EMPID = SA.ADMINID WHERE PSO.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSO.STATUS <> 'outStatus1' AND PSO.AFFIRM_FLAG = 'affirm1' AND PSO.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
(PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR PSO.INVOICE_TITLE LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR PSO.CONSIGNEE LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR CBI.CUST_NAME LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR HRE.CHINESENAME LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%'))
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY PSO.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID) FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER PSO left join PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL PSM on PSO.SALES_MODEL_NO = PSM.SALES_MODE_NO left join HR_EMPLOYEE HRE on PSO.EMPID = HRE.EMPID left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CBI on PSO.CUST_NO = CBI.CUST_NO WHERE PSO.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSO.STATUS = 'outStatus0' AND PSO.AFFIRM_FLAG = 'affirm1' AND PSO.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
(PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR PSO.INVOICE_TITLE LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR PSO.CONSIGNEE LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR CBI.CUST_NAME LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%') OR HRE.CHINESENAME LIKE concat('%',TRIM(#keyWord#),'%'))

SELECT PP.PRODUCT_NAME, PP.PRODUCT_ID, PP.PRODUCT_CAS, PP.PRODUCT_NUM, PP.SPECIFICATION, PP.PRODUCT_NO, PP.REMARK, A.CODE_NAME UNIT_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NAME PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PPSM.PRICE, PSOD.DISCOUNT, PSOD.DISCOUNT_MONEY MONEY_SUM, PSOD.QUANTITY, PSOD.OUT_QUANTITY OUT_QUANTITY FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER_DETAIL PSOD left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT_SALES_MODEL PPSM on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PPSM.PRODUCT_NO left join SY_CODE A on PP.UNIT_CODE_ID = A.CODE_ID left join SY_CATEGORY B on PP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID WHERE PSOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSOD.SALES_ORDER_NO = #SALES_ORDER_NO# AND PPSM.SALES_MODE_NO = #SALES_MODE_NO# AND PSOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY PP.PRODUCT_ID

SELECT COUNT(PP.PRODUCT_ID) FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER_DETAIL PSOD left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT_SALES_MODEL PPSM on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PPSM.PRODUCT_NO left join SY_CODE A on PP.UNIT_CODE_ID = A.CODE_ID left join SY_CATEGORY B on PP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID WHERE PSOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSOD.SALES_ORDER_NO = #SALES_ORDER_NO# AND PPSM.SALES_MODE_NO = #SALES_MODE_NO# AND PSOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PSOD.PRODUCT_NAME, PSOD.PRODUCT_ID, PP.PRODUCT_CAS, PP.PRODUCT_NUM, PSOD.SPECIFICATION, PP.PRODUCT_NO, PSOD.REMARKS REMARK, PP.CODE_NAME UNIT_NAME, PP.CATEGORY_NAME PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PSOD.PRICE, PSOD.DISCOUNT, PSOD.DISCOUNT_MONEY MONEY_SUM, PSOD.QUANTITY, PSOD.OUT_QUANTITY OUT_QUANTITY FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER_DETAIL PSOD left join (SELECT P.PRODUCT_CAS, P.PRODUCT_NUM, P.PRODUCT_NO, A.CODE_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM PROSTOR_PRODUCT P left join SY_CODE A on P.UNIT_CODE_ID = A.CODE_ID left join SY_CATEGORY B on P.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID WHERE P.CPNY_ID=#CPNY_ID# ) PP on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PSOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSOD.SALES_ORDER_NO = #SALES_ORDER_NO# AND PSOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY PSOD.PRODUCT_ID

SELECT COUNT(PP.PRODUCT_ID) FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER_DETAIL PSOD left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT_SALES_MODEL PPSM on PSOD.PRODUCT_NO = PPSM.PRODUCT_NO left join SY_CODE A on PP.UNIT_CODE_ID = A.CODE_ID left join SY_CATEGORY B on PP.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID = B.CATEGORY_ID WHERE PSOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSOD.SALES_ORDER_NO = #SALES_ORDER_NO# AND PPSM.SALES_MODE_NO = #SALES_MODE_NO# AND PSOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT ifnull((SELECT PSP.LEFT_QUANTITY FROM PROSTOR_STORAGE_PRODUCT PSP WHERE PSP.STORAGE_NO = #STORAGE_NO# AND PSP.PRODUCT_NO = #PRODUCT_NO# AND PSP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PSP.ACTIVITY = 1),0) LEFT_QUANTITY FROM DUAL

SELECT POP.OUTSTORAGE_ID, POP.PRODUCT_NO, POP.PRODUCT_ID, POP.PRODUCT_NAME, POP.PRODUCT_NUM, POP.SPECIFICATION, POP.PRODUCT_NAME||POP.SPECIFICATION NAME_SPECIFICATION, POP.PRODUCT_CAS, POP.UNIT_NAME, POP.PRICE, POP.DIS_MONEY, POP.DISCOUNT, POP.QUANTITY, POP.MONEY, POP.STORAGE_NAME, POP.STOR_ADDR, PP.REMARK FROM PROSTOR_OUTSTORAGE_PRODUCT POP left join PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP on POP.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO WHERE POP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND POP.OUTSTORAGE_ID = #OUTSTORAGE_ID# AND POP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

sqlMap.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT PSPP.MIN_QUANTITY FROM PROSTOR_STORAGE_PRODUCT_PARAM PSPP WHERE PSPP.STORAGE_NO = #STORAGE_NO# AND PSPP.PRODUCT_NO = #PRODUCT_NO# AND PSPP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PSPP.ACTIVITY = 1),0) MIN_QUANTITY FROM DUAL

SELECT POI.OUTSTORAGE_ID, POI.SALES_ORDER_ID, POI.CUST_NO, POI.CUST_NAME, POI.PHONE_NUM, POI.MONEY, POI.DISCOUNT, POI.DIS_MONEY, CBI.CUST_ID, date_format(POI.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') OUT_DATE, POI.OPERATOR, PSO.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, PSO.CONSIGNEE, if(#language#='en', HRE.ENGLISHNAME, HRE.CHINESENAME) as CHINESENAME, POI.REMARKS, ifnull((SELECT SUM(PPOR.QUANTITY) FROM PROSTOR_OUTSTORAGE_PRODUCT PPOR WHERE PPOR.OUTSTORAGE_ID = #OUTSTORAGE_ID# AND PPOR.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#),0) SUM_QUANTITY, ifnull((SELECT SUM(PPOR.MONEY) FROM PROSTOR_OUTSTORAGE_PRODUCT PPOR WHERE PPOR.OUTSTORAGE_ID = #OUTSTORAGE_ID# AND PPOR.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#),0) SUM_MONEY, HC.CPNY_NAME, HC.CPNY_ADDR, HC.CPNY_TEL_NO FROM PROSTOR_OUTSTORAGE_INFO POI left join PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER PSO on POI.SALES_ORDER_ID = PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID left join HR_EMPLOYEE HRE on PSO.EMPID = HRE.EMPID left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CBI on POI.CUST_NO = CBI.CUST_NO , HR_COMPANY HC WHERE POI.OUTSTORAGE_ID = #OUTSTORAGE_ID# AND POI.ACTIVITY = 1 AND POI.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND HC.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PSO.SALES_ORDER_ID, PSO.SALES_MODEL_NO, PSO.SALES_ORDER_NO, PSO.INVOICE_TITLE, PSO.ORIGINAL_PRICE TOTAL_MONEY, PSO.CONSIGNEE, PSO.DELIVERY_ADDRESS, PSO.ORIGINAL_PRICE, PSO.DISCOUNT, PSO.DISCOUNT_PRICE, (case SA.ACCOUNT_TYPE when 'EM' then HRE.CHINESENAME when 'CU'then CUST_INFO.CUST_NAME else CUST_INFO.CUST_NAME end ) ORDERED_PERSON, HRE.CHINESENAME ORDERED_PERSON, CBI.CUST_NAME, date_format(PSO.ORDER_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ORDER_DATE, PSM.SALES_MODE_NAME, PSO.INVOICE_TYPE, PSO.INVOICE_TITLE_TYPE, PSO.INVOICE_TITLE_CONTENT, PSO.INVOICE_CONTENT, S.CODE_NAME PAYMENTMODE FROM PROSTOR_SALES_ORDER PSO left join PROSTOR_SALES_MODEL PSM on PSO.SALES_MODEL_NO = PSM.SALES_MODE_NO left join HR_EMPLOYEE HRE on PSO.EMPID = HRE.EMPID left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CBI on PSO.CUST_NO = CBI.CUST_NO left join CUST_BASIC_INFO CUST_INFO on PSO.EMPID = CUST_INFO.CUST_ID left join SY_ADMIN SA on PSO.EMPID = SA.ADMINID left join SY_CODE S on PSO.PAYMENT_MODE = S.CODE_ID WHERE PSO.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSO.SALES_ORDER_NO = #SALES_ORDER_NO# AND PSO.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
